text:
Hi Abha,
You are great, happy and a very funny person. 
I still remember those laughs, be it in the lab or in lectures.
I miss those conversation that we used to have about life :P, and you better know my plan of life  lmao.
The thing with Harshit 2.0 and Harshit, they form a racemic mixture, both exist simultaneously. xD

Ab bs ICICI k discount dilwate rehna, account khulwa dena mera. lol
Have a great future ahead. 
Hope those laughs and smile are always be within you.
Bye.

And kabhi holidays p Kanpur aana to milna hoga fir. 
I am just a call away.

text:
Senior : "Galazy mein kyun kaam nhi kr rhe bsdk"

You : "Wo meri SPI first sem ki kharaab hogyi thi, takneek mein kaam kiya tha"

Senior : " To bsdk takneek mein kaam krne se teri SPI kharaab hogyi lodu"

Us raat bhai bada maja aaya tha, "Mummy ne mana kiya h, kaam krne se"
Senior - " Aur kisi ki mummy ne mana kiya h to chala jaye".

Fir Next is:
Me : "Bsdk laptop ko kuch nhi hona chaiye"
You : "Abe iska FB khol, FB khol"
Me : "Mana kiya n bsdk"
Dhishoom
Dhisoom Dhisoom Dhisoom

Mini Militia wali raatein. PUBG k wo raate, nightouts. 

Aur bhai tere gadde ki ma behen krne mein bada maja aaya tha, I'm loving that. Summer mein to badi bakchodi hui.

Goa mein fati to thi raaste mein, aur waha pe, pr bhagwan ki diya se sahi salamat mein aagya wapas. Agli baar chuddu ko zaroor lete jaana, bechare k bada mann tha. Uski mungfali se dane gayab ho jane se pehle ek baar trip krlena goa ki.

Baaki to fir, chaand to pyaara tha hi. Aur, crush krna to aata hi acche se, may be isbaar saath mein beth k mein bhi haath bata lunga.

Rhi beer chodne ki baat, 
....
....
....
....
Na hopayega. xD

milte h fir, jald hi
author: Harshit  Verma

text:
Yaar, I remember how in first year I did randi rona, and you helped me a lot in to just lift me up from that state. I will always be thankful to you for that.
Aur baaki summer mein, swimming se leke Blue World tk, kaafi bakchodi kri. That first year summer was the most happening summer of our stay here at IITK.
And baaki we missed you, when you can't make able to come in the final days, but abhi to 1 year tk yhi ho, so kbhi kanpur aana hua, then jaroor milenge.
Aur haan, lund k saath bakchodi krna was the most interesting thing.

Bye!
author: Harshit  Verma

text:
To : dota@iitk.ac.in

Subject : Akshat Madarchod

Dear Akshat,
It was a very good time of around 3 years which we had spent together. That "Woooooo" voice will be missed a lot. Still the party of ESC201A is pending, and I am writing this on my diary. Thank you for saving our 31680 Rs., else meri gaand tod di jaati. It was a moment of grief that you weren't able to come with us to Goa, but we did Rajasthan together.
Spending time playing Among Us, was the best part of that quarantine period. Making fake tinder IDs xD although you should say sorry to that guy named Utkarsh "bechare k 2 baar lol".
All in all, it was great time spent together. I kindly request you to please stay in touch and meet whenever you are in Kanpur or I am in Delhi, so that we can live once again on nostalgia.

Till that Ciao.

Thank You,
Cheems (Meme King lol)

author: Harshit  Verma

text:
I still remember the day we met. PHY103 tutorial was going on, you were sitting with Sardar Paji, my wingie, I sat a row next to you, and then Paji called me and said " abe bsdk idhar aake beth ", then he told me, "Ye bhi Kanpur se h, aur ye CHE k h". I was like wow man what a coincidence, pr kata to bechare k bhi h lol. 

And then the difference between your row and my row converged to zero.

It was quite a lot of fun in these four years. Those lectures, where you taught me how to use mobile during the class, yeah its quite a fun sitting in front row and being online at the same time. Internship time was a bit tough, but that is what life is, it has its ups and downs. But seriously that was a funny incident, jb ITC k ppt mein I said ki jo khade hogye unka shortlist nhi hua :| :| :|, though it was a sarcasm.

Those endless sleepless nights at library, going to Hall 2 canteen, roaming around library to hunt for other CHE batchmates, those late library sessions, doing assignments together was the beautiful life in the campus.

Ab wo August January wale kaand k to kya batau, but jo bhi hua accha hua. I do care sometimes about August but none for January. Jo ki recordings mein ekdum clear tha. xD

I still remember I called you that Antaragni night, being drunk, spoken everything lmao. The next day was fun.

Aur koi baat nhi prom night k liye nhi jaa paye but ase hi try kro, still got 1 year left. ;)

Thanks for listening my RR throughout these years, and many many more years ahead, kyunki abhi to bs shuruaat h.

Baaki Chemineers was fun, really fun. But ek baar dil p patthar rakh k Vaango chal chalenge, and bowling too. 

Baaki ye goodbye to h nhi, kyunki milna to laga hi rhega.
Ab chakkar ye h, I haven't covered 1% of what memories we have made, but still, ab isse jyaada n likha jayega.

Aur haan wo space wali trick kaam krti h. xD xD xD
author: Harshit  Verma

text:

Sorry for the sting operation conducted outside the NCL, nonetheless it was an adventurous task for me. Wish I can do many more sting operation on you in future. xD
Sad though we parted in hurry, unknowing of the future, but that's life, hope we meet in future.
Tbtk k liye TATA!!
Always stay the same, be a DHAMAKA

author: Harshit  Verma

text:
Hyo,
We spent a lot of moments together, from the labs of Vishal to labs of Control, and then this pandemic struck. I initially got you as an irritating, hyperactive and over conscious type of person, but still it was fun being friend with you, I don’t know why, but somehow, I just managed to survive with you. xD xD
I will always miss those heated bullshit arguments that we used to have, which never reached a conclusion. Those poor jokes from you which can made anyone cry, bullying professors and those theories towards life.
Accha, for that imposter kaand, I literally do not know how I was involved, I can only say sorry for that because even I am not aware how those things got fired up. That incident, I guess ruined everything between us, but I am fine, if this is what makes u satisfied. That is what life is, you can have anything in life, but you cannot have everything that you want.
Nonetheless, it was fun being with you for almost like 2 years. If I will ever write a book on my college life, you will surely be a chapter in it, may be two :P. It finally goes this way, not how long, but how well you have lived, is the main thing, I am sure these two years are enough, if not further.
Baaki memories to bhut h, can’t write each one of them here :P.
Have a great future ahead.
Ciao
author: Harshit  Verma

text:
Hi Kanishka,
I kindly request you to not make this memoir visible.
I am here to just say sorry for whatever I did, it was just a childish me. I still regret the fact that I never contacted you earlier, my ego just killed everything. But this guilt is engulfing me, and I am not able to face you or your texts. I am extremely sorry for all the chaos that I created and lost such a valuable friend or gem from my life. Please excuse me if I ever hurted you, it wasn’t supposed to be but if I ever just excuse me.
Stay the same, that you were in those days, be like a rockstar, and all the best for all your future endeavors. I don’t know what your plans are ahead, but whatever they are, you will definitely gonna excel.

I thought every day, and brought the courage, killed my ego to write this, hope you understand. I am not in a state to face you.
They say, You can’t be bitter and expect life to be sweet. Hope now I can die with one less regret. 
Bye!
Extremely Sorry!
I kindly request you to not make this memoir visible.
author: Harshit  Verma

text:
Yo DMID BETA xD
urf Dr Disappoint urf Samdu
The first year days, jb PHY103 mein lagi rehti thi. Mini Militia mein lagate the.
Wo GBMs and all, first year was the best.
But second year to usse bhi bakchod, F213 F211 F212 k combination was best. ESC201 k tutorial k pehle wala session, Piano bajana, Yadav k room mein PUBG nightouts maarna, Hall 4 k tawa paneer khane jaana, bulla kaatna, mere according sbse best year 2nd year hi tha apna.
Fir 3rd year mein chode hue bhut, IME k chomda, intern k chomda, coromna k choda pr overall it was fun. IME k chomde ko aaj ego side mein rkh k message bhi krdiya, badi himmat se kiya h, pr ab thoda halka halka feel ho rha.

Aur haan 3rd year k starting mein, kaise tera chutiya kaata will always stay in my mind. Maja aagya chutiya kaat ke. 4th year mein to bs aakhri mein jaakr campus formality ki, tried to replicate what we did earlier, pr wo maja kaha. 

Aur haan, wo tere ko yaad hoga n, ki jb mein marr jau to tere ko kya krna h?
Kr dena!!!

xD xD xD
Chalo phir milenge, agli trip pr.
Tbtk keep disappointing us in PUBG!! lmao 
Bye Bye DMID Beta
